text: wqal aladhin 'uwtuu aleilm biallah wshreh werfu haqayiq al'umur liladhin qalu: ya layt lana mithl ma 'uwti qarwn: waylakum ataquu allah watyewh, thwab allah liman aman bih wbrslh, waeamil al'aemal alsalht, khyr mimaa 'uwti qarwn, wala yataqabbal hadhih alnsyht wywffaq 'iilayha wayaemal biha 'iilaa man yujahid nfsh, wayasbir ealaa taeat rbh, wyjtnb measyh
